mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_tenant WHERE deleted = 0 AND status = 1 AND (id = #{tenantId} OR parent_id = #{tenantId})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_user WHERE deleted = 0 AND status = 1 AND tenant_id = #{tenantId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM charging_station WHERE deleted = 0 AND tenant_id = #{tenantId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM charger WHERE deleted = 0 AND tenant_id = #{tenantId}

SELECT co.order_no, cs.name AS station_name, c.code AS charger_code, su.username AS user_name, co.total_amount, co.status, co.create_time FROM charging_order co LEFT JOIN charging_station cs ON co.station_id = cs.id LEFT JOIN charger c ON co.charger_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON co.user_id = su.id WHERE co.deleted = 0 AND co.tenant_id = #{tenantId} ORDER BY co.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
